name: Chaos Magi
description:
In this short game, you will have to jump around platforms while changing your character ang getting to the next level in time.

Controls:

Movement         A.D<- ->

Jump                     Space

Pause                    Enter

Change               M (or click on the magic circle on the left below)

(Only in Spanish for now, I will upload the English version too soon)

Both songs are from Gigakoops!

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/gigakoops
